falling leaves gloves © sara öhman 4 repeat rounds 2-4 until row 24 on chart b is finished and there are 17 sts between the markers for the thumb gusset upper hand round 1 k4 row 1 of chart b for 21 sts k to marker remove markers and place the 17 thumb gusset sts on waste yarn cast on 1 st using the backward loop method and knit to end you will now have 56 sts again round 2-18 k4 chart b for 21 sts k to the end of the round place all stitches on waste yarn or holder fingers little finger from holder put 6 sts from the palm and 6 sts from the back on needle start the round on the palm k6 cast on 2 sts using the backward loop method k6 you now have 14 sts knit 24 rounds or as many as you need next round k2tog to the end next round k1 k2tog to the end thread yarn through remaining stitches ring finger from holder put 6 sts from the palm and 6 sts from the back on needle start the round on the palm k6 cast on 2 sts using the backward loop method k6 pick up and knit 2 sts from the edge of the little finger you now have 16 sts knit 31 rounds or as many as you need next round k2tog to the end next round k2tog to the end thread yarn through remaining stitches middle finger from holder put 7 sts from the palm and 7 sts from the back on needle start the round on the palm k7 cast on 2 sts using the backward loop method k7 pick up and knit 2 sts from the edge of the ring finger you now have 18 sts knit 34 rounds or as many as you need next round k2tog to the end next round k1 k2tog to the end thread yarn through remaining stitches index finger from holder put 9 sts from the palm and 9 sts from the back on needle start the round on the palm k18 and pick up and knit 2 sts from the edge of the middle finger you now have 20 sts knit 32 rounds or as many as you need next round k2tog to the end next round k2tog to the end thread yarn through remaining stitches falling leaves gloves © sara öhman 5 thumb slip the 17 sts back onto the needles knit the stitches and pick up and knit 3
